Uses of Package
com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase

Classes in com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase used by com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase
BaseDao
          A DAO implementation that uses a constructor provided EntityMapper to do basic conversion between entities and HBase Gets and Puts.
BaseEntityScanner
          Base EntityScanner implementation.
CompositeDao
          The CompositeDao provides an interface for fetching from tables that may have multiple entities stored per row.
DeleteAction
          Represents a Delete.
DeleteActionModifier
          Generic callback interface used by HBaseClientTemplate class.
EntityComposer
          An EntityComposer is an interface that supports entity construction and de-construction methods.
EntityComposer.Builder
          An interface for entity builders.
EntityMapper
          An interface for mapping HBase Result instances to a Key/Entity pair, and a Key/Entity to an HBase Put instances.
EntityScannerBuilder
          An abstract class that EntityScanner implementations should extend to offer a builder interface.
EntitySerDe
          This class handles entity serialization and deserialization.
GetModifier
          Generic callback interface used by HBaseClientTemplate class.
HBaseClientTemplate
          This class simplifies the use of HBase client, and helps to avoid common errors by managing its own cleanup of resources.
KeySerDe
          This class handles key serialization and deserialization.
PutAction
          Represents an HBase Put.
PutActionModifier
          Generic callback interface used by HBaseClientTemplate class.
ScanModifier
          Generic callback interface used by HBaseClientTemplate class.
VersionCheckAction
          A version check action, which allows us to check that the version of an entity hasn't changed.
